catalog_script_client.name: ChamaApiViaCep

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_37d768f1c39d421029107405e40131cd
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:b9d7a4f1c39d421029107405e401314b</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>ChamaApiViaCep</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	var cep = g_form.getValue('cep');
	var ga = new GlideAjax('ApiViaCep');  
   ga.addParam('sysparm_name','getCepInfo'); 
   ga.addParam('sysparm_cep', cep); 

   ga.getXML(AnswerFn); 

	function AnswerFn(response){
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");

		answer = JSON.parse(answer);

		
		g_form.setValue('cidade', answer.localidade);
		g_form.setValue('estado', answer.uf);
		g_form.setValue('bairro', answer.bairro);
		g_form.setValue('rua', answer.logradouro);
	}
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-01 21:09:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>37d768f1c39d421029107405e40131cd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ChamaApiViaCep</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Case Banco Brasil Tecnologia" source="x_1174267_case_b_0">c1eb252c4704021008334d05516d4344</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Case Banco Brasil Tecnologia">c1eb252c4704021008334d05516d4344</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_37d768f1c39d421029107405e40131cd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-01 21:09:43</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
